description: half length portrait of artist turnedleft, wearing a lace collar and wig; in an oval frame; below frame in upper corners are portraits of P. Van Somer and Isaac Beckett; lower corners lying sideways portraits of John Sturt and William Elder; an illustration from Walpole's Catalogue of Engravers, volume 4
inscription:
Signature, Title, and Inscription

below image in black:  A. Bannerman Sculp. / ROBERT WHITE /  in image in black names of each engraver
title: Robert White
